Game.Name: 2-in-1 Fun Pack - Shrek 2 + Madagascar - Operation Penguin (Europe)
Game.plot: 2-In-1 Fun Pack: Dreamworks Madagascar: Operation Penguin / Dreamworks Shrek 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by Activision,which was released in 2006.Cheat: Press select during gameplay, then enter the code.Cheat: Press select during gameplay and enter the followingCheat: In most levels you can find the Leprechaun to play Mini-Games. However, if you beat the game 100%, you can unlock all the Mini-Games and play them as often as you want.
